RESOURCE.NAME: MetaMap Annotator
RESOURCE.COMMENT: This plugin uses the MetaMap Java API to send GATE document content to MetaMap skrmedpostctl server and PrologBeans mmserver instances running on the given machine/port

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Name for the MetaMap Annotation types

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If set, only send the content of the given Annotations in the input Annotation Set to MetaMap

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypeFeature
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If set, only send the content of the given feature from annotations within inputASTypes to MetaMap

PARAMETER.NAME: outputMode
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output highest scoring final mapping, all mappings, all candidate terms, or all candidates and mappings

PARAMETER.NAME: annotateNegEx
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output NegEx negation annotations and features?

PARAMETER.NAME: taggerMode
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Map first instance of a term only, first instance plus coreferences, or all instances independently

PARAMETER.NAME: annotNormalize
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Strip determiners from annotation content prior to MetaMap submission?

PARAMETER.NAME: excludeIfContains
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Don't process terms that contain these annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: excludeIfWithin
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Don't process terms that are within these annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
